body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Roger Morris and the customer's name is Marilyn Lee.  The conversation is about a random business (a Language School ) and is a conversation about pricing.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Roger Morris, and I represent the Global Language Institute. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Roger, this is Marilyn Lee. I was looking for some information about your language courses.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for reaching out, Marilyn! I’d be happy to help with that. Can I start by asking what language you are interested in learning?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! Spanish is a beautiful language. Our courses range from beginner to advanced levels. May I ask for your email address to send you more details?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Marilyn. Also, could you provide me with your phone number? It helps us follow up with you if needed.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course! My phone number is three zero three, four five six, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Marilyn. Our Spanish courses are very popular, and we have flexible pricing depending on the duration of the course. Would you like to know more about the pricing options?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, please! I would really appreciate that.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! I will send all the details to your email shortly. Thank you for your time today, Marilyn, and I look forward to helping you learn Spanish. Have a great day!
